@peretti that was Marvin's class! Brilliant, zany, crazy, profound, sometimes absurd. But he always made us think. And he will be missed...
@peretti after class, I remember  debating with other grad students if this dishwasher plan was the smartest or dumbest idea we'd ever heard
@peretti a student asked why a robot can't do dishes. Marvin's answer: just get three dishwashers & use them as shelves and washers! Solved!
@peretti or he'd start class with open ended questions: why do we experience emotions? Why can't a robot do simple tasks a 6 yr old can do?
@peretti he'd enter with a stack of overhead projector transparencies, grab one at random, and start class with a diagram, theory, or idea..
